meta.content: Meyerpark Elementarty Charter School,Meyerpark Elementary School,charter schools in Houston Texas

meta.name: description
meta.content: MeyerPark Elementary Charter School is located in Houston, Texas, just south of Willowbend Boulevard, on Post Oak Road. Our charter school serves awesome students in pre-k through 6th grade.

div.p: Meyerpark Elementary Charter School is now hiring teachers for the 2020–2021 school year. Read more >>>
MeyerPark Elementary Charter School requires students to wear a school uniform. Read more >>>

If you are interested in attending Meyerpark Charter, please fill out the application on our Admissions page. We will contact you regarding space availability. Thank you for your interest in our school!

img.alt: Welcome to Meyerpark Elementary Charter School

div.p: Welcome to the MeyerPark Elementary Charter School website. Our charter school serves awesome students in pre-k through 6th grade. Here at MeyerPark, not only do we offer the best education around, we also have small class sizes, highly qualified teachers, and a family-like environment where kids won’t get lost in the crowd.
We invite you to come and visit our campus and find out more about what we can offer students and families.
Mark your calendars for these important dates:

Welcome to our website! We are very excited to have the opportunity to serve our students and their families, and we invite you to get to know us. Whether you are looking for a more loving, challenging elementary school atmosphere or an educational alternative to traditional public school, MeyerPark has something to offer you. Helping strengthen family-child bonds is also extremely important to us here at MeyerPark, and you will find this an integral part of our campus atmosphere. I know I speak on behalf of our faculty and staff when I say we love what we do! Stop by our campus for a tour. We’d love to meet you!

Most Sincerely,
Julia Wright
Principal/Superintendent

Albert Glover, Jr. (a.glover@meyerparkcharter.org)
Gloria Whitaker Ford (g.whittaker@meyerparkcharter.org)
Larry Baker (l.baker@meyerparkcharter.org)
Corliss Denman (c.denman@meyerparkcharter.org)
Lisa Hammond (l.hammond@meyerparkcharter.org)
